General.Name: Otokar Otomotiv ve Savunma Sanayi AS
General.Description: Otokar Otomotiv ve Savunma Sanayi A.S. engages in manufacturing and selling commercial and defense industry vehicles in Turkey. The company off-road vehicles, armored vehicles, minibuses, bus type vehicles, and light trucks. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

2.Name: Dogan  Seckinler
2.Title: Director of Fin., Risk Management & Investor Relations
